phrases: Oh, right...
I am in love with someone now.
From Now On
Right now, I am in love.
I have heard that when you are in love, the world starts to look totally different...
In my case, I have not noticed any significant changes.
Good morning, uglyface!
Jeez, that is the first thing that comes out of your mouth?
Kindly cover that mouth of yours, will you?
It is unseemly!
What?
It is just...
When I see those winter uniforms,
it reminds me of when you kneed me that first day we met,
and it gives me the chills.
Speaking of getting kneed...
Ouch!
What do you think you are doing, huh?
Your new girlfriend just showed up in her new uniform!
How about a little praise?
Oh, that is what you want?
You are cute.
Yes, you are cute.
Not good, not good!
Why am I jumping for joy over such blatant lip service?
Oh, well, I guess I might have changed in some small ways.
Like feeling so elated over the most trivial things.
Hey.
Ichijo and Chitoge.
Good morning.
Good morning.
Master Raku!
Good morning to you!
Raku Ichijo!
You bastard... how could you, when you have Young Mistress!
Like getting even more pissed at annoying things!
Whatever the case,
as you can see, the romance I would always yearned for...
Now then, how is this going to turn out?
Wait!
Seriously, how is this going to turn out?
Hold up!
It is good that I know I am in love with this guy,
Raku and Chitoge's NEXT STAGE
but what happens next?
If I like him, then does that mean, uh... that I want to date him or something?
In other words, not be his fake girlfriend, but his real girlfriend?
Mmm, that does not feel right somehow!
In the first place, what would we do if we were dating?
Like... walk home together after school...
stop for snacks on the way...
go on dates on our days off...
Hey!
Is not that the same thing we are doing now anyway?
Then does this mean that I...
Ichijo!
Come hither!
Come hither!
Do not call me in that creepy way!
I have a feeling that is close.
But I do not know.
Somehow that just does not feel right.
Wait!
What am I going to do?
Now I am getting seriously confused!
What kind of relationship do I want with him, exactly?
Hey, Chitoge!
What?
You got your locket back?
Yeah.
Well, for what it is worth.
And I thought I should let you three know.
Oh, man!
This makes me feel so complete!
Creepy.
I am so glad for you.
That you got it back safe and sound.
Well, but the thing is...
All right, then, Master Raku!
Without further ado!
Let us open up that locket with this key, shall we?
Hey, hold up a second, Tachibana!
Oh, where is the harm?
Now you will finally know who your first love was.
Well, although it had to be me.
At last, we will have proof that it was I who promised you my hand in marriage.
Come, come!
You two standing there...
You are dying to find out as well.
I just know it!
Listen to me!
Do not jump the gun like that!
Um, I...
I do not think... um...
That we need to open it just yet, you know?
Chitoge?
Well, because!
See...
There is no need to rush into it, right?
It might be better to wait till things settle down.
And besides, this is just something that happened when we were kids, so...
What is with her?
Just the other day, she was all fired up to get to the bottom of it.
My, my, Kirisaki.
You must really be terrified to find out that you were not his soulmate.
There, there, I understand.
What the...?!
That is not what I meant!
I think I kind of want to know, too...
Kosaki?
If... No matter who opens it, see...
This was something that happened when we were kids.
So I do want to, you know, find out...
Actually...
That is why I am telling you, hold up, hold up, hold up!
It is still broken, all right?
This locket.
Hey, so long story short...
I got as far as extracting the stuck key and fixing it up.
But there is something stuck in the back of the locket,
and there is no way to open the lock by normal means.
I could get it out by smashing it open.
What is your call?
By the way, Shu, about that photo book...
Well, but if it is not fixed...
An autographed limited edition!
So anyway...
Do not break it!
Do not break it!
This is important to me, you know!
Anyway...
Eventually we might find a way to open it,
so I want you to wait till then.
And if we still cannot figure it out,
and you think you just have to know the truth,
then let us bust this open and take a look inside.
I mean, maybe that will give us a clue.
I suppose it cannot be helped.
Not having to break it would be best, though, right?
Still, I wonder what it could be.
An object that can be placed in something this size.
You said we would take it out together when we were reunited, right?
Yeah.
An engagement ring, maybe?
You are all very funny.
Jeez, I got all nervous for nothing!
What are you going to do to make up for this letdown?
Hey, I tried to tell you guys right away!
But...
If we would gotten the locket open,
what in the world would have happened?
If my key had opened it...
If... my key had not opened it...
If I just went on having feelings for him,
and then found out later that I was not his soul mate,
how would I feel, I wonder?
I-I know!
This was something that happened when we were kids.
But I cannot stop thinking about it.
Hey, what am I going to do?
I am starting to feel uneasy!
And I still do not even know how I want this to turn out!
How do I want it to turn out?
Do I want things to stay the way they are now?
Well, but unless I make a move,
he will never realize how I feel about him, will he?
Hey, Chitoge?
What is it?
Look, do not you think you are acting kind of weird today?
When I saw your face, I thought, maybe...
But are you... just like I thought?
No way...
Do not tell me...
He noticed?
How I feel about him?
I... Did my face really give me away?
No, no, no...
Not this moron of all people, no way would he...
Of course he is going to say something lame.
Seriously...
why did not you say something sooner?
You are...
Hungry, are not you?
I knew it!
I spend so much time with you,
I pretty much know what makes you tick now.
You have this intense look on your face over something,
but when you have that look, it is usually when you are hungry.
Come to think of it, you did not have much for lunch, did you?
Oh, I get it.
You are on a diet, right?
You moron!
All right...
Oh, well!
I will think about the complicated stuff later.
Hey, treat me to ramen again!
Why should I...?
Wait, so you are hungry after all!
Never mind that!
Please Notice
My lips are so dry these days.
Chitogecchi, do not you wear lip gloss?
Lip gloss?
Hold on a second!
I will lend you mine.
Ta-da!
I bought this lip gloss the other day.
You know, the kind that makes your lips all supple!
Go on, try it!
Okay!
Hey, you look totally adorable!
You really look good with it on, Chitoge!
Y-You think so?
Yes!
Yes!
You look so good, you are making me jealous!
So cute!
Dammit!
Curse you and your model's face...
You rock anything you wear, damn you!
Hey!
Ouch, ouch!
Why you little...
S-Stop!
If you like it, you can have it.
Are you sure?
Yeah.
To be honest, I did not know what to do with it.
And besides, you look better in it, Chitogecchi.
It is going to make Ichijo go all weak at the knees, huh?
Go ahead and put it on again tomorrow.
I-Is that right?
Will he think I look cute?
But he...
He could not be more dense, so...
M-Morning, darling!
Hey, morning, honey.
Hey, it is even chillier than usual today, huh?
Wh-What did we have for first period again today?
English, I think.
I do not think there was any homework.
Well, he missed it spectacularly, did not he now?
Although I did expect as much.
C-Come to think of it, you know winter's...
It is the season for feeling dry, is not it?
What is that all of a sudden?
Well, uh...
I was thinking how dry my lips get.
Lips?
Yeah, I hear you!
My lips always get chapped in winter,
and I am like, Ouch! and there is blood.
And it takes forever to heal, you know?
What?
Notice them!
Come on, I practically shoved them in your face!
Why, you...!
What are you going to do about this tiny courage I have mustered...
Come on!
Are you trying to tell me I am not even a speck in your eye?
Dammit!
I am not going to let it end like this, you know!
Oh, good morning, Chitoge!
Huh?
You are wearing lip gloss today, Chitoge!
You look so cute!
Now that it is come to this, I am going to make him notice or die trying!
But lip gloss alone is not going to cut it for that oblivious fool.
Morning, bean sprout!
Yo, morn
Hey, somehow today is, you know...
Compared to yesterday, it is a little...
The air feels a little warmer, huh?
Well?
The shampoo I used this morning is 5,000 yen more expensive than my usual one!
You must have noticed that, at least, right?
If you sniff this sweet fragrance...
You think?
I was thinking it is colder than yesterday.
Y-Y-You miserable jerk!
D-Did you just dismiss my secret weapon shampoo with one sneeze?
Why, you dumbass!
You are nothing but a bean sprout!
Nothing but a bean sprout!
No, wait!
Let us calm down a little!
Even girls do not always notice lip gloss or shampoo.
No wonder that moron did not notice it either - it cannot be helped.
I have got to be more blatant with him.
Ta-da!
How about this?
I almost never do my nails.
Okay, cool!
I think they look pretty cute!
Something this obvious, he is sure to notice, right?
Hey, hey!
Raku!
This is the handout I borrowed the other day.
I will give it back to you, okay?
Now then...
Comments, please?
Okay.
Ouch!
Huh?
Hey... ouch!
Ouch!
What the hell do you think you are doing?!
Comments, please?
No, that hurts!
What do you think you are doing?
Oh, does it?
Then maybe I will pound you with my fist next?
Why do you get like that?
Jeez!
I never dreamed he was this much of an idiot!
You dummy!
Dummy!
Dummy!
Dummy!
Why do not you notice them?
Or is it that you do notice, but you have no comment?
Either way, it is so frustrating!
Now that it is come to this...
Now that it is come to this!
This should do it!
This should do it!
What do you say?
He is sure to notice this,
and if it is this drastic a change, he will not be able to ignore it, will he?
Oh, wow, Chitoge!
Is that ribbon part of a makeover?
Morning.
M-My, my, darling, you are late today!
Oh, hey... morning, honey.
I kind of overslept today, see...
All that homework yesterday, you know?
I tried to get it all done as soon as I could,
but it was harder than I thought.
Oh, is that right?
Well, not that we have to turn it in any time soon.
Hey!
Come on!
Wh-Why are you ignoring me?
Do not tell me you do not even notice this?
Is that even possible?
H-Hey, you!
Is not there anything you would like to say about me today?
H-How do you do?
What kind of answer is that?!
Me, too, now that you mention it.
My shoulders got all stiff from studying yesterday.
Oh, yeah?
You hitting the books, right?
Are you sure you were not watching some TV show and lazing around?
Wh-Why?!
Why will not he say anything?!
Do not tell me he really has not noticed it yet!
But if he has noticed, I am sure there would be some kind of reaction!
Just how dense is he, anyway?
Jeez!
I do not believe this!
This ribbon was my most alluring feature!
How can I get him to notice it?
Or is it that he could not care less about me?
Huh?
Your lunch today, it is not the usual Kobe beef,
but Iberico ham, huh?
Vitamins are good for you, right?
Yep, vitamins!
That is what you notice?!
For God's sake, cow or pig?
I only just found that out myself now!
Does this mean the change in me is less important?!
Sooo annoying!
Oh, man, I am so frustrated!
Notice it!
Notice it!
Notice it!!!
Excuse me, Mr. Ichijo?
Yes?
I am going to test your abilities as a boyfriend.
Please point out any changes you have noticed in me recently!
This feels so futile.
Have you changed somehow?
Oh, hey, I mean, you have totally changed, huh?
It seems to me like you have changed.
Um...
Hey!
Have you gained a little weight?
Look, you!
M-M-M-M-My bad!
I was just kidding!
Um...
Did you cut your bangs?
No, I did not!
Are you wearing mascara?
These are natural, I will have you know!
Did you grow taller?
Who grows that fast?!
Is it your new diet...?
Want me to clock you again?
But I do not know about any other changes.
Seriously, why did I have to go and fall for a guy like this?
No way...
This is not about you wearing lip gloss for the last three days, right?
You mean you noticed that?
What?
Is that the change you are talking about?
Then... what about the shampoo?
Oh, so you did change it.
And my nails?
Well... I guess I did.
Why did not you say anything when you noticed?
Why should I have to say stuff like that?
I mean, even if I did notice,
guys normally do not go around saying, Hey, looking good, right?
Hey!
H-Hold up, forget I just said that!
What do you mean, forget it?
Because it would be weird!
Why should I say stuff like that to you?
It is not weird!
For a girl, whether or not you notice that kind of thing is so crucial!
If you want to be popular with girls, why do not you put some thought into that?
Or what is this?
Is it because you did not think I looked good?
Are you saying that I did not look cute?
I would not go that far, but...
Well, I suppose you were rather cute, young lady.
In that case, it is all right.
By the way, what do you think of this ribbon?
Ribbon?
It is not your usual one!
What?
You mean you never noticed it?
